tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    part_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    supplier_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_parts (
  part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_name VARCHAR(50),
  part_description TEXT,
  part_quantity INT,
  part_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE accessories (
  acc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  acc_name VARCHAR(50),
  acc_description TEXT,
  acc_quantity INT,
  acc_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(255),
    part_category VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE accessories (
    accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    accessory_name VARCHAR(255),
    compatible_parts VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_id INT,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(255),
    maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE drone_parts (
    part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    part_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_model VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    drone_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    manufacture_date DATE NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE repairs (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT NOT NULL,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    repair_date DATE NOT NULL,
    repair_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drone_parts (
  part_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  part_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE drone_accessories (
  accessory_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  accessory_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT NOT NULL,
  supplier_id INT,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
